protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Involved in the specific phosphorylation of microtubule- associated proteins for tau, MAP2 and MAP4. Phosphorylates CDC25C on 'Ser-216'

reference.reference_text: Peng CY, Graves PR, Ogg S, Thoma RS, Byrnes MJ 3rd, Wu Z, Stephenson MT, Piwnica-Worms H: C-TAK1 protein kinase phosphorylates human Cdc25C on serine 216 and promotes 14-3-3 protein binding. Cell Growth Differ. 1998 Mar;9(3):197-208.
